intro: Maytenus jelskii, commonly known as the Jelskii's mayten, is a species of flowering plant in the family Salicaceae. It is native to the tropical regions of South America, particularly Brazil. The plant is characterized by its simple, alternate leaves and small, inconspicuous flowers. It typically grows as a shrub or small tree, often in humid, shaded environments. Its botanical features make it of interest to botanists and horticulturists studying tropical flora.
